displayName.text: Tiny Smiles Pediatric Dentistry - Lower East Side

formattedAddress: 504 Grand St # M5, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 504 Grand St # M5, New York, NY 10002-4182, USA

originalText.text: First and foremost one of the BEST dentistry practices I’ve ever been to. Dr. Gabby is AMAZING. Not only was she knowledgeable, informative, she teaches as she works and she’s a sweetheart too. She made my son’s dental experience less scary, since he’s had a traumatic one with another dentist and was afraid since then. She is very gentle and fun when it comes to getting work done. Not only is the doctor great, the staff here are absolutely FANTASTIC, super kind and helpful. I couldn’t have stumbled upon a BETTER dentistry than LIV. I am so appreciative of everyone here and for making my son’s dental experience AWESOME! Would recommend to everyone!

originalText.text:
De. Gabby was so good
With my daughter… super friendly and pleasant to deal with. The faculty itself is very nice and welcoming, the front desk women are also pleasant to deal with.

originalText.text: Most amazing pediatric dentistry office in NYC! The receptionist is warm and welcoming. Dr. Dobkin and her assistant Rodrigo are gentle, kind and thorough. They talked to my 5 year old throughout the process, and he was visibly less afraid. I just want to thank everyone in the office so much for everything!

They talked to my 5 year old throughout the process, and he was visibly less afraid. I just want to thank everyone in the office so much for everything!

originalText.text: First time here and I loved it! The doctor was super friendly, patient and informative . Will definitely recommend this office for anyone that is looking for pediatric dentists.

text.text: First time here and I loved it! The doctor was super friendly, patient and informative . Will definitely recommend this office for anyone that is looking for pediatric dentists.

originalText.text: My kiddo (9yr) just got a cavity filled and Dr. Hussein was so gentle and great. I would highly recommend!
